21 2 2 2 96 280 1928 373 1948 assuming
21 2 2 3 96 384 1928 425 1943 that
21 2 2 4 96 436 1928 467 1943 the

21 2 2 15 96 1100 1928 1137 1943 null
21 2 2 16 94 1148 1928 1264 1948 hypothesis”

21 2 2 19 96 1382 1928 1454 1947 p-value

21 2 2 21 96 1528 1930 1560 1943 out
21 2 3 1 96 174 1957 194 1970 to
21 2 3 2 96 204 1955 226 1970 be

21 2 3 4 96 280 1955 326 1970 than

21 2 3 6 96 356 1955 502 1974 predetermined
